summary: Adds a fully craftable and enchantable Masamune to Skyrim. Based off the Advent Children version of a sword. This is playable, but it is a WIP.
descriptionHtml:
Read the Image I uploaded for detailed info. (OPEN THE IMAGE IN A NEW TAB)

Adds the Masamune to Skyrim. You can make it at a forge and you can also enchant it and improve it at a grindstone. It requires daedric smithing and arcane blacksmith. It has issues with the specmap/ cubemap because I wanted it to look reflective/glossy like it did in the movie, but apparently the Creation Engine has some issues with that. I am working on a fix for that. The textures are not final and more detailed textures are coming soon. Also, Tsurgui will be added Masamune is complete. I already have it modeled, I just need to map it (which takes time). THIS MOD IS A WIP. Keep that in mind :p. 

Overview

- Craftable and enchantable

- Fast attack speed

- Slightly better than Daedric Greatsword 

- Materials to make it can be easily acquired


Thanks for downloading and HAVE FUN! Also, feel free leave me some feedback and suggestions in the comments. I really helps.
author: xseph1rothx
